title: Ajax vs Chelsea LIVE score: TV time, team news and live stream details
text:
Chelsea aim to put pressure on the rest of Champions League Group H as they face Ajax at the Amsterdam Arena on Wednesday night.

The Blues lost their group opener against Valencia but bounced back in their last European fixture by beating Lille 2-1 - thanks to goals from Tammy Abraham and Willian.

A win over last year's semi-finalists will take them level on points with the Dutch side and Spanish rivals Valencia, if they beat Lille in the other game in the league.

But it won't be easy, as Erik ten Hag's men haven't lost in any competition this season and are yet to concede in the Champions League.

Ajax XI: Onana, Dest, Veltman, Blind, Tagliafico, Martínez, Edson Álvarez, Ziyech, Van de Beek, Promes, Tadic.

Chelsea XI: Kepa, Azpilicueta, Zouma, Tomori, Marcos Alonso, Kovacic, Jorginho, Mount, Willian, Abraham, Hudson-Odoi.

Follow all the LIVE action here with Mirror Football.

The game will be televised on BT Sport 3 and can be live streamed on the BT Sport app.
description: Chelsea travel to last season's semi-finalists Ajax at the Amsterdam Arena on Wednesday evening. Kick off 17.55 BST
